midas/utils/mchart.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /********************************************************************\
00002 
00003   Name:         mchart.c
00004   Created by:   Pierre-Andre Amaudruz
00005 
00006   Contents:     Periodic Midas chart graph data generator.
00007                 Generate the proper configuration and data files for
00008     the gstripchart application or the GH (Gertjan Hofman)
00009     stripchart.tcl
00010     standard running description is:
00011     mchart -f <file> -q <ODB tree> -c
00012      ex:  mchart -f trigger -q /equipment/trigger/statistics -c
00013           produce trigger.conf and trigger (data)
00014 
00015     mchart -f <file>[.conf] -g
00016      ex:  mchart -f trigger[.conf] -gg
00017           produce periodically trigger and spawn gstripchart for
00018     display of the data.
00019     See mchart -h for further info.
00020 
00021   $Log: mchart.c,v $
00022   Revision 1.1.1.1  2005/06/20 23:37:38  mucap
00023   Importing release 1.9.5 of the MIDAS source code as distributed by PSI.
00024   (Next, I'll commit our local customizations.)
00025

00066 #include <fcntl.h>
00067 #include "midas.h"
00068 #include "msystem.h"
00069 
00070 #define  CONF_CREATE  1
00071 #define  CONF_APPEND  2
00072 
00073 char color[][16] =
00074     { "blue", "red", "brown", "black", "orange", "cyan", "yellow", "beige", "DarkCyan",
00075    "DarkOliveGreen", "goldenrod", "DeepPink"
00076 };
00077 INT max_element = 8;
00078 DWORD delta_time;
00079 BOOL keep = FALSE, debug = FALSE, create_only = FALSE;
00080 BOOL create = FALSE, config_done = FALSE;
00081 INT graph = 0, element = 0;
00082 
00083 INT mchart_compose(HNDLE hDB, char *confpath, char *datapath, char *eqpstr);
00084 INT conf_compose(INT action, char *confpath, char *datapath, char *field, float val);
00085 float toplimit = 0., botlimit = 0.;
00086 
00087 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00088 INT conf_compose(INT action, char *confpath, char *datapath, char *field, float val)
00089 {
00090    FILE *f;
00091    float minval, maxval;
00092 
00093    if (config_done)
00094       return 0;
00095 
00096    switch (action) {
00097    case CONF_CREATE:
00098       if (keep)
00099          return 1;
00100       /* open device */
00101       f = fopen(confpath, "w+");
00102       if (f == NULL) {
00103          printf("Cannot open configuration strip file.\n");
00104          return 0;
00105       }
00106       fprintf(f, "#Equipment:            >%s", field);
00107       fprintf(f, "\n");
00108       fprintf(f, "menu:                   on\n");
00109       fprintf(f, "slider:                 on\n");
00110       fprintf(f, "type:                   gtk\n");
00111 
00112       fprintf(f, "minor_ticks:            12\n");
00113       fprintf(f, "major_ticks:            6\n");
00114 
00115       fprintf(f, "chart-interval:         1.000\n");
00116       fprintf(f, "chart-filter:           0.500\n");
00117       fprintf(f, "slider-interval:        0.200\n");
00118       fprintf(f, "slider-filter:          0.200\n");
00119       fclose(f);
00120       break;
00121 
00122    case CONF_APPEND:
00123       if (keep)
00124          return 1;
00125 
00126       f = fopen(confpath, "a+");
00127       if (f == NULL) {
00128          printf("Cannot open configuration strip file.\n");
00129          return 0;
00130       }
00131       if ((element % max_element) == 0)
00132          element = 0;
00133 
00134       minval = maxval = val;
00135       /* check upper limits */
00136       if (toplimit == 0.) {     /* use current value */
00137          if (val == 0.)
00138             maxval = 5.;
00139          else if (val > 0.)
00140             maxval *= 2.;
00141          else
00142             maxval /= 2.;
00143       } else                    /* use arg value */
00144          maxval = toplimit;
00145 
00146       /* check lower limits */
00147       if (botlimit == 0.) {     /* use current value */
00148          if (val == 0.)
00149             minval = -5.;
00150          else if (val > 0.)
00151             minval /= 2.;
00152          else
00153             minval *= 2.;
00154       } else                    /* use arg value */
00155          minval = botlimit;
00156 
00157       fprintf(f, "begin:        %s\n", field);
00158       fprintf(f, "  filename:     %s\n", datapath);
00159       fprintf(f, "  fields:       2\n");
00160       fprintf(f, "  pattern:      %s\n", field);
00161       fprintf(f, "  equation:     $2\n");
00162       fprintf(f, "  color:        %s\n", color[element++]);
00163       fprintf(f, "  maximum:      %6.2f\n", maxval);
00164       fprintf(f, "  minimum:      %6.2f\n", minval);
00165       fprintf(f, "  id_char:      1\n");
00166       fprintf(f, "end:            %s\n", field);
00167       fclose(f);
00168       break;
00169    default:
00170       printf(" unknown command \n");
00171    }
00172    return 1;
00173 }
00174 
00175 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00176 INT mchart_get_names(HNDLE hDB, char *eqpstr, char *element, char **pname, INT * esize)
00177 {
00178    char *pslash, *p;
00179    char strtmp[128];
00180    HNDLE hKeyS, hSubKey;
00181    KEY key;
00182    INT i, size, status;
00183    BOOL bslash = FALSE;
00184 
00185    /* convert to upper */
00186    p = eqpstr;
00187    for (i = 0; i < 128; i++)
00188       strtmp[i] = 0;
00189    while (*p)
00190       *p++ = (char) tolower(*p);
00191 
00192    /* I don't remember what I'm doing here but it's useful! */
00193    if (strncmp(eqpstr, "equipment/", 10) == 0)
00194       bslash = TRUE;
00195    if (strncmp(eqpstr, "/equipment/", 11) == 0) {
00196       /* if the -q starts with /equipment and 2 more slash are following
00197          OR
00198          if the -q starts with equipment and 1 more slash are following
00199          then I search the Settings for the names of the variables */
00200       pslash = strchr(eqpstr, '/');
00201       pslash = strchr(pslash + 1, '/');
00202       if (!bslash)
00203          pslash = strchr(pslash + 1, '/');
00204       if (pslash) {
00205          strncpy(strtmp, eqpstr, pslash - eqpstr);
00206          strcat(strtmp, "/settings");
00207 
00208          if (db_find_key(hDB, 0, strtmp, &hKeyS) == DB_SUCCESS) {
00209             db_get_key(hDB, hKeyS, &key);
00210             for (i = 0;; i++) { /* search first for "Names element" */
00211                db_enum_key(hDB, hKeyS, i, &hSubKey);
00212                if (!hSubKey)
00213                   break;
00214                db_get_key(hDB, hSubKey, &key);
00215                if (key.name[5] && key.type == TID_STRING) {     /* fmt Names xxxx */
00216                   p = &(key.name[6]);
00217                   if (strstr(p, element) == NULL)
00218                      continue;
00219                   *esize = key.item_size;
00220                   size = *esize * key.num_values;
00221                   *pname = malloc(size);
00222                   status = db_get_data(hDB, hSubKey, *pname, &size, key.type);
00223                   return key.num_values;
00224                }
00225             }
00226             /* rescan dir for "Names" only now */
00227             db_get_key(hDB, hKeyS, &key);
00228             for (i = 0;; i++) {
00229                db_enum_key(hDB, hKeyS, i, &hSubKey);
00230                if (!hSubKey)
00231                   break;
00232                db_get_key(hDB, hSubKey, &key);
00233                if (strncmp(key.name, "Names", 5) == 0) {        /* fmt Names (only) */
00234                   *esize = key.item_size;
00235                   size = *esize * key.num_values;
00236                   *pname = malloc(size);
00237                   status = db_get_data(hDB, hSubKey, *pname, &size, key.type);
00238                   return key.num_values;
00239                }
00240             }
00241          }
00242       }
00243    }
00244    return 0;
00245 }
00246 
00247 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00248 INT mchart_get_array(FILE * f, char *eqpstr, HNDLE hDB, HNDLE hSubkey, KEY key,
00249                      char *confpath, char *datapath)
00250 {
00251    char field[128];
00252    INT nfound, status, i, size, esize;
00253    char *pspace, *pdata = NULL, *pname = NULL;
00254    float value;
00255 
00256    size = key.num_values * key.item_size;
00257    pdata = malloc(size);
00258    status = db_get_data(hDB, hSubkey, pdata, &size, key.type);
00259    if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00260       free(pdata);
00261       return 0;
00262    }
00263 
00264    if (debug)
00265       printf("%s : size:%d\n", key.name, size);
00266 
00267    nfound = mchart_get_names(hDB, eqpstr, key.name, &pname, &esize);
00268 
00269    if (debug)
00270       printf("#name:%d #Values:%d\n", nfound, key.num_values);
00271    /* if names found but no array then use variable names */
00272    if (key.num_values == 1)
00273       nfound = FALSE;
00274    for (i = 0; i < key.num_values; i++) {
00275       if (nfound)
00276          strcpy(field, (pname + (i * esize)));
00277       else {
00278          if (key.num_values == 1)
00279             sprintf(field, "%s", key.name);
00280          else                   /* if no settings/Names ... found then compose names here */
00281             sprintf(field, "%s[%i]", key.name, i);
00282       }
00283 
00284       /* substitution for tcl */
00285       while ((pspace = strstr(field, " ")))
00286          *pspace = '_';
00287       while ((pspace = strstr(field, "%")))
00288          *pspace = '_';
00289 
00290       /* fill data file */
00291       if (key.type == TID_INT) {
00292          value = (float) *((INT *) (pdata + (i * key.item_size)));
00293          fprintf(f, "%s %d\n", field, *((INT *) (pdata + (i * key.item_size))));
00294       } else if (key.type == TID_WORD) {
00295          value = (float) *((WORD *) (pdata + (i * key.item_size)));
00296          fprintf(f, "%s %d\n", field, *((WORD *) (pdata + (i * key.item_size))));
00297       } else if (key.type == TID_DWORD) {
00298          value = (float) *((DWORD *) (pdata + (i * key.item_size)));
00299          fprintf(f, "%s %ld\n", field, *((DWORD *) (pdata + (i * key.item_size))));
00300       } else if (key.type == TID_FLOAT) {
00301          value = *((float *) (pdata + (i * key.item_size)));
00302          fprintf(f, "%s %f\n", field, *((float *) (pdata + (i * key.item_size))));
00303       } else if (key.type == TID_DOUBLE) {
00304          value = (float) *((double *) (pdata + (i * key.item_size)));
00305          fprintf(f, "%s %e\n", field, *((double *) (pdata + (i * key.item_size))));
00306       } else
00307          continue;
00308 
00309       if (!config_done) {
00310          if (debug)
00311             printf("Field:%s Values:%f\n", field, value);
00312          conf_compose(CONF_APPEND, confpath, datapath, field, value);
00313       }
00314    }
00315    if (pdata)
00316       free(pdata);
00317    if (pname)
00318       free(pname);
00319    return 1;
00320 }
00321 
00322 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00323 INT mchart_compose(HNDLE hDB, char *confpath, char *datapath, char *eqpstr)
00324 {
00325    FILE *fHandle;
00326    INT i, status;
00327    KEY key;
00328    HNDLE hKey, hSubkey;
00329 
00330    /* check if dir exists */
00331    if ((status = db_find_key(hDB, 0, eqpstr, &hKey)) == DB_SUCCESS) {
00332       fHandle = fopen(datapath, "w+");
00333       if (fHandle == NULL) {
00334          printf("Cannot open config %s file.\n", confpath);
00335          return -1;
00336       }
00337 
00338       db_get_key(hDB, hKey, &key);
00339       if (key.type != TID_KEY) {
00340          status = mchart_get_array(fHandle, eqpstr, hDB, hKey, key, confpath, datapath);
00341          if (status < 1) {
00342             printf("Error: cannot get array for %s\n", eqpstr);
00343             return -2;
00344          }
00345       } else
00346          for (i = 0;; i++) {
00347             db_enum_key(hDB, hKey, i, &hSubkey);
00348             if (!hSubkey)
00349                break;
00350             db_get_key(hDB, hSubkey, &key);
00351             status =
00352                 mchart_get_array(fHandle, eqpstr, hDB, hSubkey, key, confpath, datapath);
00353             if (status < 1) {
00354                printf("Error: cannot get array for %s\n", eqpstr);
00355                return -3;
00356             }
00357          }                      /* get value */
00358    } /* equ found */
00359    else {
00360       printf("Error: Equipment:%s not found\n", eqpstr);
00361       return 0;
00362    }
00363    fclose(fHandle);
00364    config_done = TRUE;
00365    return 1;
00366 }
00367 
00368 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00369 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00370 {
00371    char command[128];
00372    BOOL daemon, keep_strip = FALSE;
00373    INT status, last_time = 0;
00374    DWORD i;
00375    HNDLE hDB, hKey;
00376    char host_name[HOST_NAME_LENGTH], expt_name[NAME_LENGTH];
00377    char eqpstr[128] = { '\0' };
00378    char ch, cmdline[256];
00379    char mchart_dir[128] = { '\0' }, mchart_data[128], mchart_conf[128];
00380    INT msg, childpid;
00381    int sys_err;
00382    /* set default */
00383    cm_get_environment(host_name, sizeof(host_name), expt_name, sizeof(expt_name));
00384    delta_time = 5000;
00385    daemon = FALSE;
00386 
00387    /* retrieve environment */
00388    if (getenv("MCHART_DIR")) {
00389       strcpy(mchart_dir, getenv("MCHART_DIR"));
00390       if (mchart_dir[strlen(mchart_dir) - 1] != DIR_SEPARATOR)
00391          strcat(mchart_dir, DIR_SEPARATOR_STR);
00392    }
00393 
00394    /* get parameters parse command line parameters */
00395    for (i = 1; i < argc; i++) {
00396       if (argv[i][0] == '-' && argv[i][1] == 'd')
00397          debug = TRUE;
00398       else if (argv[i][0] == '-' && argv[i][1] == 'c')
00399          create_only = TRUE;
00400       else if (argv[i][0] == '-' && argv[i][1] == 's')
00401          keep = TRUE;
00402       else if (argv[i][0] == '-' && argv[i][1] == 'g' && argv[i][2] == 'g')
00403          graph = 2;
00404       else if (argv[i][0] == '-' && argv[i][1] == 'g' && argv[i][2] == 'h')
00405          graph = 3;
00406       else if (argv[i][0] == '-' && argv[i][1] == 'g')
00407          graph = 1;
00408       else if (argv[i][0] == '-' && argv[i][1] == 'k')
00409          keep_strip = TRUE;
00410       else if (argv[i][0] == '-' && argv[i][1] == 'D')
00411          daemon = TRUE;
00412       else if (argv[i][0] == '-') {
00413          if (i + 1 >= argc || (argv[i + 1][0] == '-' && !isdigit(argv[i + 1][1])))
00414             goto usage;
00415          if (strncmp(argv[i], "-u", 2) == 0)
00416             delta_time = 1000 * (atoi(argv[++i]));
00417          else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-f", 2) == 0) {
00418             char *pt;
00419             pt = strstr(argv[++i], ".conf");
00420             if (pt)
00421                *pt = '\0';
00422             strcpy(mchart_data, mchart_dir);
00423             strcat(mchart_data, argv[i]);
00424             sprintf(mchart_conf, "%s.conf", mchart_data);
00425          } else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-e", 2) == 0)
00426             strcpy(expt_name, argv[++i]);
00427          else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-h", 2) == 0)
00428             strcpy(host_name, argv[++i]);
00429          else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-q", 2) == 0) {
00430             if (argv[++i][0] != '/')
00431                strcpy(eqpstr, "/");
00432             strcat(eqpstr, argv[i]);
00433             create = TRUE;
00434          } else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-b", 2) == 0)
00435             botlimit = (float) atof(argv[++i]);
00436          else if (strncmp(argv[i], "-t", 2) == 0)
00437             toplimit = (float) atof(argv[++i]);
00438       } else {
00439        usage:
00440          printf("usage:   mchart -u updates (5sec)\n");
00441          printf("                -f configuration or data file name\n");
00442          printf("                -q equipment\n");
00443          printf(" (override all) -b bot_limit -t top_limit (only with -q) \n");
00444          printf("                -c create config only \n");
00445          printf("                -k keep spawned stripchart or gstripchart\n");
00446          printf
00447              ("                -g spawn Hofman stripchart or gstripchart if possible\n");
00448          printf("                -gg forces gstripchart spawning\n");
00449          printf("                -gh forces  stripchart spawning\n");
00450          printf("                -D start as daemon (prevented if -c or -q)\n");
00451          printf("                   requires $MCHART_DIR\n");
00452          printf("               [-h Hostname] [-e Experiment]\n\n");
00453          printf("ex: Creation  : mchart -e myexpt -h myhost -c \n");
00454          printf("                -f mydata -q /equipement/myeqp/variables\n");
00455          printf("    Running   : mchart -e myexpt -h myhost -f mydata \n");
00456          printf("    Run/Graph : mchart -e myexpt -h myhost -f mydata -g\n");
00457          printf("    MCHART_DIR: environment variable for mchar directory\n\n");
00458          return 0;
00459       }
00460    }
00461 
00462 /* Daemon start */
00463    if (daemon && !(create || create_only)) {
00464       printf("Becoming a daemon...\n");
00465       ss_daemon_init(FALSE);
00466    }
00467 
00468    if (daemon)
00469       printf("arg -D ignored due to creation request! \n");
00470 
00471 /* connect to experiment */
00472    status = cm_connect_experiment(host_name, expt_name, "MChart", 0);
00473    if (status != CM_SUCCESS)
00474       return 1;
00475 
00476    if (debug)
00477       cm_set_watchdog_params(TRUE, 0);
00478 
00479    /* turn off message display, turn on message logging */
00480    cm_set_msg_print(MT_ALL, 0, NULL);
00481 
00482    /* connect to the database */
00483    cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, &hKey);
00484 
00485    /* initialize ss_getchar() */
00486    ss_getchar(0);
00487 
00488    /* recompose command line */
00489    sprintf(cmdline, "%s ", argv[1]);
00490    for (i = 2; i < argc; i++) {
00491       strcat(cmdline, " ");
00492       strcat(cmdline, argv[i]);
00493    }
00494 
00495    /* check if creation required */
00496    if (!create) {
00497       /* extract equipment key */
00498       FILE *f;
00499       char strtmp[128];
00500       char *peqp;
00501 
00502       config_done = TRUE;
00503       create = FALSE;
00504       /* Overwrite the -q using the file.conf content */
00505       f = fopen(mchart_conf, "r");
00506       if (f == NULL) {
00507          printf("Error: Cannot open %s\n", mchart_conf);
00508          goto error;
00509       }
00510       fgets(strtmp, 128, f);
00511       if (strstr(strtmp, "#Equipment")) {
00512          peqp = strstr(strtmp, ">");
00513          sprintf(eqpstr, "%s", peqp + 1);
00514       }
00515       fclose(f);
00516       peqp = strstr(eqpstr, "\n");
00517       *peqp = 0;
00518    } else {
00519       INT size;
00520       /* creation of config file requested */
00521       /* check if equipment string is a valifd key in order to
00522          prevent overwriting the configuration file */
00523       size = sizeof(eqpstr);
00524       if (db_find_key(hDB, 0, eqpstr, &hKey) != DB_SUCCESS) {
00525          printf("unknown odb path under -q arg. (%s)\n", eqpstr);
00526          goto error;
00527       }
00528       status = conf_compose(CONF_CREATE, mchart_conf, mchart_data, eqpstr, (float) argc);
00529       if (status != 1)
00530          goto error;
00531    }
00532 
00533    do {
00534       if ((ss_millitime() - last_time) > delta_time) {
00535          last_time = ss_millitime();
00536          status = mchart_compose(hDB, mchart_conf, mchart_data, eqpstr);
00537          if (status != 1)
00538             goto error;
00539          if (create_only) {
00540             printf("mchart file %s created\n", mchart_conf);
00541             goto out;
00542          }
00543       }
00544 
00545       /* spawn graph once if possible */
00546       if (graph == 1) {
00547          char command[128];
00548          char *list = NULL;
00549          INT i, nfile;
00550 
00551          char strip[][32] = { "/usr/local/bin", "stripchart",
00552             "/usr/bin", "gstripchart",
00553             "/home/midas/bin", "stripchart",
00554             "/usr/sbin", "gstripchart",
00555             "/home/chaos/bin", "stripchart",
00556             "/sbin", "gstripchart",
00557             ""
00558          };
00559 
00560          i = 0;
00561          while (strip[i][0]) {
00562             nfile = ss_file_find(strip[i], strip[i + 1], &list);
00563             free(list);
00564             if (nfile == 1)
00565                break;
00566             i += 2;
00567          }
00568          if (strip[i][0] == 0) {
00569             printf("No graphic package found in following dir:\n");
00570             i = 0;
00571             while (strip[i][0]) {
00572                printf("Package : %s/%s \n", strip[i], strip[i + 1]);
00573                i += 2;
00574             }
00575             break;
00576          }
00577          if (i % 2)
00578             sprintf(command, "gstripchart -g 500x200-200-800 -f %s", mchart_conf);
00579          else
00580             sprintf(command, "stripchart %s", mchart_conf);
00581 
00582          if (!daemon)
00583             printf("Spawning graph with %s ...\nUse '!' to exit\n", command);
00584          ss_exec(command, &childpid);
00585       } else if (graph == 2) {  /* Gnu graph */
00586          sprintf(command, "gstripchart -g 500x200-200-800 -f %s", mchart_conf);
00587          if (!daemon)
00588             printf("Spawning graph with %s ...\nUse '!' to exit\n", command);
00589          ss_exec(command, &childpid);
00590       } else if (graph == 3) {  /* Hofman graph */
00591          if (debug) {
00592             sprintf(command, "stripchart -debug %s", mchart_conf);
00593             if (!daemon)
00594                printf("Spawning graph with %s ...in DEBUG mode \nUse '!' to exit\n",
00595                       command);
00596             sys_err = system(command);
00597             printf("system error return %d \n", sys_err);
00598             cm_disconnect_experiment();
00599             return 1;
00600 
00601          } else {
00602             sprintf(command, "stripchart %s", mchart_conf);
00603             if (!daemon)
00604                printf("Spawning graph with %s .... \nUse '!' to exit\n", command);
00605             ss_exec(command, &childpid);
00606          }
00607 
00608       }
00609 
00610       graph = 0;
00611       ch = 0;
00612       while (ss_kbhit()) {
00613          ch = ss_getchar(0);
00614          if (ch == -1)
00615             ch = getchar();
00616          if (ch == 'R')
00617             ss_clear_screen();
00618          if ((char) ch == '!')
00619             break;
00620       }
00621       msg = cm_yield(200);
00622 
00623       /* exit this process if no stripchart associated to it */
00624       if (!keep_strip && !ss_existpid(childpid))
00625          break;
00626 
00627    } while (msg != RPC_SHUTDOWN && msg != SS_ABORT && ch != '!');
00628 
00629  out:
00630  error:
00631    printf("\n");
00632 
00633    /* reset terminal */
00634    ss_getchar(TRUE);
00635 
00636    cm_disconnect_experiment();
00637    return 1;
00638 }
Generated on 6 Jun 2014 for AlcapDAQ:Rootana by  1.6.1
